archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Create Resource Orders
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Where the initiating request or the purchased product offering has a standard set of associated resource orders this process is responsible for issuing the resource orders, and for creating a record of the relevant initiating request or customer order information and the associated resource orders. Where the initiating request or the purchased product offering has special or unusual requirements, and a specific feasibility assessment and/or resource design has been previously created, this process is responsible for issuing the resource orders, and for creating a record of the relevant initiating request or customer order information and the associated resource orders.

properties.value: Not used for this process element
